      • selectDiseaseByPage

        @GetMapping(value="/list_disease")
public ResultDTO<com.github.pagehelper.PageInfo<Disease>> selectDiseaseByPage(@RequestParam(value="currentPage")
                                                                                                                 int currentPage,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="pageSize")
                                                                                                                 int pageSize,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="diseaseCategoryId")
                                                                                                                 int diseaseCategoryId)
        请求指定页的疾病信息
        参数:
        currentPage - 当前页码
        pageSize - 页面大小
        diseaseCategoryId - 疾病种类编号
        返回:

public ResultDTO<Disease> addDisease(@RequestParam(value="diseaseIcd")
